203     def __init__(
204         self,
205         node_id: str,
206         config: Optional[FederationConfiguration] = None,
207         password: str = "default_federation_password"
208     ):
209         """Initialize federated learning framework.
210         
211         Args:
212             node_id: Unique identifier for this node
213             config: Federation configuration
214             password: Password for secure communication
215         """
216         self.node_id = node_id
217         self.config = config or FederationConfiguration()
218 
219         # Security and privacy
220         self.secure_comm = SecureCommunication(password)
221         self.privacy = DifferentialPrivacy(self.config.differential_privacy_epsilon)
222 
223         # Network state
224         self.known_nodes: Dict[str, FederatedNode] = {}
225         self.knowledge_store: Dict[str, KnowledgePacket] = {}
226         self.local_knowledge: Dict[str, Any] = {}
227 
228         # Aggregation state
229         self.aggregation_active = False
230         self.aggregation_thread: Optional[threading.Thread] = None
231         self.stop_event = threading.Event()
232 
233         # Performance tracking
234         self.collaboration_metrics: Dict[str, List[float]] = defaultdict(list)
235         self.knowledge_quality_history: List[float] = []
236 
237         # Threading
238         self.executor = ThreadPoolExecutor(max_workers=4)
239 
240         # Logger
241         self.logger = logging.getLogger(__name__)
242 
243         # Initialize local node
244         self._initialize_local_node()
245
